body: Finally got my new #car! Check it out! #newride #carlover

comments.body: Whoa, that looks amazing! Is it as fast as it looks?
@78787 It definitely is! Took it for a spin earlier, and I still can’t wipe the grin off my face.
That car is a beauty! What’s the first road trip you’re planning?
@89898 Thanks! I’m thinking of taking it down the coast next weekend. Perfect excuse for a long drive!
@67676 Sounds like a perfect plan. Nothing beats a coastal road trip, especially in that car!
That’s a slick ride! What model is it? I’ve been thinking about upgrading my car too.
@56565 It’s the new Turbo X! You should totally go for it. Feels like you’re driving a rocket!
Now that’s a car worthy of some serious weekend adventures. I’m picturing you zipping down the highway with the top down!
@45454 Haha, exactly! I might just have to do that once the weather’s nice.
Okay, I’m officially jealous! You better give me a ride next time we hang out.
@34343 Deal! You’ll love it—just let me know when you’re free.
